name: biomni-optimize-anaerobic-digestion-process
title: Biomni: Optimize Anaerobic Digestion Process
description: Optimize anaerobic digestion process conditions to maximize VFA production or methane yield
content:
Overview

Optimizes anaerobic digestion process parameters to maximize either Volatile Fatty Acid (VFA) production or methane yield through computational modeling and response surface methodology. This tool analyzes the complex interactions between operational parameters and microbial community performance, enabling optimization of biogas production, waste treatment efficiency, and bioenergy generation from organic waste materials.

Input Parameters

  • waste_characteristics (required): Dictionary containing waste properties including COD, VS, TS, C/N ratio, and substrate composition
  • operational_parameters (required): Operating conditions including temperature, pH, HRT (hydraulic retention time), OLR (organic loading rate), and mixing regime
  • target_output (optional, default: 'methane_yield'): Optimization objective - either 'methane_yield' or 'vfa_production'
  • optimization_method (optional, default: 'rsm'): Optimization algorithm - 'rsm' (Response Surface Methodology) or other statistical methods

Input Format

{
  "waste_characteristics": {
    "cod_mg_l": 50000,
    "vs_percent": 80,
    "c_n_ratio": 25
  },
  "operational_parameters": {
    "temperature_c": 37,
    "ph": 7.0,
    "hrt_days": 20,
    "olr_kg_vs_m3_day": 2.5
  },
  "target_output": "methane_yield",
  "optimization_method": "rsm"
}

Biological Use Case

Critical for microbiology and biotechnology applications including:

  • Optimization of biogas production from agricultural waste
  • Wastewater treatment plant efficiency improvement
  • Bioenergy generation from food waste and organic residues
  • VFA platform for producing bio-based chemicals
  • Microbial community engineering for enhanced digestion
  • Process troubleshooting and stability improvement
  • Scale-up of laboratory anaerobic digestion systems

Output

Provides comprehensive optimization results including:

  • Optimal operational parameter values for maximum yield
  • Predicted methane yield or VFA concentration
  • Response surface plots and contour diagrams
  • Statistical analysis of parameter interactions
  • Process performance predictions under various conditions
  • Recommendations for process control and monitoring
  • Detailed optimization report (digestion_optimization_results.txt)

Category

microbiology
